text: [Project 2] Week 1: Kickoff meeting held and scope clarified.
[Project 2] Week 2: Initial design documents reviewed and approved.
[Project 2] Week 3: Backend development started with API setup.
[Project 2] Week 4: Front-end framework integrated and tested.
[Project 2] Week 5: Delayed due to team availability issues.
[Project 2] Week 6: Resumed progress after resource reallocation.
[Project 2] Week 7: Client requested additional feature integration.
[Project 2] Week 8: Mid-phase demo delivered to stakeholders.
[Project 2] Week 9: Minor bugs discovered in QA testing phase.
[Project 2] Week 10: Hotfix deployed after initial testing feedback.
[Project 2] Week 11: Security audit passed with minimal recommendations.
[Project 2] Week 12: Final user acceptance testing scheduled.
[Project 2] Week 13: Documentation completed for final delivery.
[Project 2] Week 14: Project handover planned with operations.
[Project 2] Week 15: Post-mortem review scheduled next week.
